item.content:encoded:
• Added override input text font option.
  • Show all thumbnails for multiple image links in a message.
  • Supported inline images on plixi.com and puu.sh.
  • Follow the changes of gist.
  • Updated server list.
  • Fixed a bug in /omsg and /onotice commands.
  • KOI8-R and KOI8-U support.
